subject: Russian Empire
object: Съ нами Богъ! | S nami Bog! | ("God is with us!")

subject: Russian Empire
object: Гром победы, раздавайся! | Grom pobedy, razdavaysia! | ("Let the Thunder of Victory Rumble!") (unofficial); Коль славен наш Господь в Сионе | Kol' slaven nash Gospod' v Sione | ("How Glorious Is Our Lord in Zion") (unofficial); Молитва русских | Molitva russkikh | ("The Prayer of Russians"); Боже, Царя храни! | Bozhe Tsarya khrani! | ("God Save the Tsar!")

object: Majority - 71.10% Orthodox (official), Minorities - 11.07% Muslim, 9.16% Catholic, 4.16% Jewish, 3.00% Protestant, 0.94% Armenian, 0.56% other
